content:
There are a few ways you could make a video based on this text longer than 10 minutes:

1. Add more details: You could expand on the story of Subnautica by including more information about the characters, their motivations, and the world they inhabit. This could help to create a richer and more immersive narrative that viewers will be interested in watching for longer periods of time.
2. Include gameplay footage: If you are making a video about the game Subnautica, you could include gameplay footage of your own experiences playing the game. This would allow you to show off different aspects of the game and provide context for the story being told in the narration.
3. Analyze the themes: You could take a more analytical approach to the story of Subnautica by exploring the themes and ideas that the game touches on. For example, you could talk about the dangers of unchecked corporate greed or the consequences of interfering with natural ecosystems.
4. Include interviews: If possible, you could interview people involved with the development of Subnautica or experts in fields related to the game's themes. This could provide additional insights and perspectives that would make the video more engaging and informative.

By incorporating some or all of these elements, you could create a video that is longer than 10 minutes and provides a deeper exploration of the world and story of Subnautica.
